page.title: 05Trade - Cronton
page.content: {Trade;Types of Retailer:}Newsagent, Greengrocer,Butcher,Hairdresser,Off- Licence.Chipshop,Post Office,Handimans Store which is linked to an engineering workshop for motor vehicle repairs.There are also two farm shops in the vicinity.{Location:}The first five listed are in one block in Hampton Drive,the others in Cronton Road.The chipshop,owned by Greek Cypriots,prepare English and Continental food to "take-away". {Other Retail Outlets:}The two public houses,the Holy Family Club and Community Centre,but only during normal licencing hours.{Super-markets: although there are no super-markets in the village,there are two large ones not too distant in Widnes and Ditton. Inspite of this competition,the local retailers provide a reasonably competative service.
